name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meeting-recruitment-app-nodejs
title: Recruitment App Sample using Apps in Meetings
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates a recruitment meeting app with integrated bots for notifications, meeting details, and in-meeting features to assist the interview process.
longDescription: This recruitment app sample enhances meeting experiences by integrating features like bots for notifications, meeting details, and in-meeting assistance such as adding questions, notes, and side panel views. It helps streamline the interview process with features for adding, editing, and sharing candidate information.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing recruitment app sample using apps in meetings

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
